import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getFilterPopulation } from '../../actions' import style from './Filters.module.css' export default function Filters() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const activity = useSelector((state) => state.allActivities) const handleFilterPopulation = (e) => { dispatch(getFilterPopulation(e.target.value)) } return (
) }
